Name: Image.Grayscale
Desc: Converts the image to grayscale using various algorithms.
LongDesc: The Grayscale method transforms the image to grayscale using selectable algorithms such as average, luminance, lightness, desaturation, or single channel. It supports partial intensity and thresholding for black-and-white effects.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Grayscale({ algorithm: 'luminance' }); });
